episode_event_valentine_2024/4001_1101_0: Palentine’s Day was around the corner...
A sweet scent soon started to drift around town.
episode_event_valentine_2024/4001_1001_0:
You want to show your gratitude to people
precious to you for Palentine’s Day.

But we don’t usually cook much... What should
we do?
Got it! If that’s the case, let me help!

Let’s work together so we can express our
gratitude through tasty dishes!
episode_event_valentine_2024/6801_1001_0:
Any dish will turn out perfect if it’s made with
focus and love!
With focus and love... That’s a nice phrase!

I’ll do my best to support you so you can convey
those feelings!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4002_1001_0: Now then, let’s begin our cooking lesson!

To start, I’d like everyone to tell me what kind of
feelings you’d like to express through your cooking
and to whom.

The dish and the advice I suggest will change
depending on what you answer!

I would like to express my gratitude to my
daughter Janine.

She always brought me my box lunch when I
was busy.

So why don’t we make a box lunch for Janine
that’s full of love?

I would like to give Darach some sweets for
always helping me.
But not just any sweets will do.
episode_event_valentine_2024/4002_1001_1:
They must be so perfect, they’ll take Darach’s
breath away…

For you, let’s try and make sweets that are a bit
more complex, Caitlin!

I’d like to express my gratitude to the many fans
who always support me.

Then for you, Gordie, let’s try sweets that are
easy to make in large amounts!

Maylene always helps me train, and since she’s
a growing girl...
I’d like to prepare her an extraordinary feast!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4002_1001_2:
So you’ve already decided what you want to
make?

Yup! I really want to do well, so I even prepared
this outfit!
Definitely looks like you’re ready to go!

By the way, I noticed that partner Pokémon of
yours.
Yeah. Caught my eye as well.
That’s a Galarian Darmanitan, isn’t it?
I just wanted to check in!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_0:
Oh, she’s grown into a healthy Darmanitan. I
knew you could do it.

Yup! I raised Darmanitan from an Egg I got
from Melony!

Since we’re both Ice-type users, we get
along well.

I just wanted to pass down the techniques and
Pokémon I’m so proud of...

since a certain someone is too busy with
Rock types...

You’re all practicing cooking, right? Do your best
so your feelings reach those who are special
to you!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_1:
Would you be able to help me teach everyone,
Melony?

I wouldn’t ask me that if I were you! My teaching
style is very strict!
Now, I should get going so I don’t get in the way.
Jeez... Don’t know why she decided to show up...
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1101_1:
The group set their goals, and the cooking
lesson officially began...
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_1:
It has the bare minimum nutrition needed and can
be stored for a long time! A perfect meal for
a ninja!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_2:
But there’s more to a box lunch than just dried
food, Koga...

Try to remember the box lunch Janine made
for you.
Let’s work on making it tastier and more colorful!
I am going to make the finest sweets...

which is why I brought ingredients of the
highest quality.

I wanted to create flavors as elegant as the
sweets Darach always prepares for me.

But the most important thing is your feelings,
Caitlin. Not the price of the ingredients.

There have to be flavors that only you can create
since you know Darach so well. That’s the key!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_3:
Instead of trying to copy commercial products, I
will aim to create a flavor to Darach’s liking.

Wow, Gordie! As skillful as expected! These
cookies are so tasty!
I don’t think there’s much more I can teach—
Well then, I have another question.

I wanted to make a few special ones as
a surprise.
I’d appreciate it if you had any good ideas...
episode_event_valentine_2024/4003_1001_4: Is this meal Dynamaxed or something?!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4004_1001_0: I just made as many dishes as I could!

Darmanitan’s fire and ice moves helped me! I
saved a lot of time!
I want Maylene to eat a lot!
If it makes Maylene happy, this might work, but...

If you just want to fill her stomach, couldn’t she
just go to an all-you-can-eat restaurant?

Why don’t we think a little more about the feelings
that only you can show to Maylene?
episode_event_valentine_2024/4004_1001_1:
Maybe I could subtly ask what Maylene likes
to eat?
Nice! A simple but effective method!
But what should I do with all this food?
Don’t worry! No food will go to waste!
W-wow... It disappeared in no time!

Greedent always taste-tests my cooking, so I know
that no matter how much food there is, he can
eat everything.
Now then, shall we go to where Maylene—

Actually, wait... Maybe you should change into
normal clothes before you go?
episode_event_valentine_2024/4005_1001_0: Maylene! I got you a snack!
Wow, thanks! I was just getting hungry!

You’re not picky... You seem to find any kind of
food tasty, don’t you?
So, do you have a favorite food?
Hmm... I don’t really have a particular favorite...
Oh, but I like anything if it’s made by you!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4005_1001_1:
Yes! Each dish you’ve made me has become a
special memory for me!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4006_1001_0: I want to ask everyone for a favor!

I’d like you all to train with Maylene at a specific
place on Palentine’s Day.
episode_event_valentine_2024/4007_1001_0:
Y-yes... It’s not much, but I wanted to show my
gratitude for all that you do...
I hope this is made to your satisfaction.
Thank you for everything that you do, Darach.
episode_event_valentine_2024/4007_1001_1: My heart is so full, and...I’m at a loss for words...
This is for you. It’s special.

You’re technically the first member of my
fan club, remember?

I giving this to you as my number one fan, not as
my mother.
So don’t get the wrong idea...
episode_event_valentine_2024/4008_1001_0: Please eat this and warm up!
This... You made this for me before!
Once, when I was training on a cold day...
You brought this stew for me as a gift.

I remember how much it warmed both my body
and my spirit...and it tasted so good!
I also remember how happily you ate it up!

Since today is Palentine’s Day, I wanted to give
you a taste from your memories!
episode_event_valentine_2024/4008_1001_1:
No, thank YOU as well for always helping
me train...

Aww... I feel so sad now that I’m almost finished
eating this...
No need to worry! There’s plenty more!

Seeing people smile when they eat your food is
the best kind of happiness.
That’s why cooking is so fun!
